title: Academic Document Metadata
description: Schema for academic document metadata after processing with docling

course.description: Course code or name that the document belongs to

topic.description: Topic or module within the course

originalFilename.description: Original filename of the PDF document

markdownPath.description: Path to the generated markdown file

conversionDate.description: Date and time when the conversion was performed

pageNumber.description: Page number where the image appears

classification.description: Classification of the image (chart, diagram, photo, etc.)

caption.description: Caption or description of the image

images.description: List of images extracted from the document

pageNumber.description: Page number where the table appears

rows.description: Number of rows in the table

columns.description: Number of columns in the table

caption.description: Caption or title of the table

tables.description: List of tables extracted from the document

pageNumber.description: Page number where the formula appears

explanation.description: Explanation or description of the formula

formulas.description: List of mathematical formulas extracted from the document

pageCount.description: Total number of pages in the original document

wordCount.description: Total word count in the document

conversionTimeSeconds.description: Time taken to convert the document in seconds

processingStats.description: Statistics about the processing of the document
